name: disk-0 MADNESS
description:
Note: If you are on mobile and want to use the touchscreen download "disk-0-MADNESS-mobile.html". Virtual DPAD control works on any mobile version.

============================================

Objective

Avoid enemies that have a different color than yours and absorb the ones with the same color as yours. Trigger bombs to switch enemies' color to yours!

Survive as long as possible. The game gets harder the longer you play, and the music adapts to the difficulty.

Controls

MOUSE: 

  • Hold the right button to move. 
  • Click the left button to switch color.

KEYBOARD: 

  • Use arrows to move
  • X to switch color.

Change palette with Z or middle mouse anytime.
